pr_title: Fix setting parent for the included view

timeline.message:
#10195 properly pass parent when setting included view in process
#10195 rewrite params to `openModal` AC
#10195 change how we get the parent id for creating process

timeline.bodyText: Should this be passed as param in here if it already has the same default value ?
timeline.author: petrican
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1201,17 +1210,13 @@ export function handleProcessResponse(response, type, id, parentId) {
               keepProcessModal = true;
 
               await dispatch(
-                openModal(
-                  '',
-                  action.windowId,
-                  'window',
-                  null,
-                  null,
-                  action.advanced ? action.advanced : false,
-                  '',
-                  '',
-                  action.documentId
-                )
+                openModal({
+                  title: '',

timeline.bodyText: I'm a bit confused. We are expecting in here parentWindowId and this is not passed anymore. This may lead to future logic bugs.
timeline.author: petrican
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -214,6 +215,7 @@ class Modal extends Component {
             processType: windowId,
             viewId,
             parentId: parentWindowId,

replies.bodyText: Yeah, a leftover since we don't use this anywhere
replies.author: siemiatj
